name: Jewel Sliding - Block Puzzle
description:
Jewel Sliding™ is a simple & relaxing puzzle game!
Easy to Play but Hard to Master!
Enjoy this brand new puzzle game with the players around the world!

Easy to Play:
- Simply slide the blocks to clear!
- Clear more blocks to get a higher score and more fun!
- Color Block is so powerful! Take good use of it!
- Try not to let the blocks reach the top

Jewel Sliding™ Highlight:
- Dazzling jewels with fancy background
- Charming sound effect
- Easy to play with endless fun
- No Time Limited! Enjoy it all the time!
- No network required

Thanks for playing Jewel Sliding™!

You are always welcomed to reach us at: puzzletopmaster@gmail.com
